entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Dorion
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:52 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 03:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -0.9°C
Wind: ENE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or freezing drizzle. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 this evening. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow mixed with freezing drizzle. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or freezing drizzle ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
